bulkStar.name: Bulk Star
bulkStar.description: A heavy machine with extreme durability and great ramming power, but very low handling.

compactStar.name: Compact Star
compactStar.description: A lightweight, highly maneuverable machine with excellent turning.

formulaStar.name: Formula Star
formulaStar.description: A fast and aerodynamic machine with good balance across most stats.

jetStar.name: Jet Star
jetStar.description: A machine with excellent glide and aerial control, ideal for high-speed flight.

rexWheelie.name: Rex Wheelie
rexWheelie.description: A powerful bike with high offense and heavy weight, but low flight capabilities.

rocketStar.name: Rocket Star
rocketStar.description: A clean all-rounder specializing in boost and acceleration-heavy racing.

shadowStar.name: Shadow Star
shadowStar.description: A stealth-oriented machine with balanced speed and strong aerial control.

slickStar.name: Slick Star
slickStar.description: A slippery machine with strong grip and great turning ability.

swerveStar.name: Swerve Star
swerveStar.description: Excellent for sharp turns, the Swerve Star excels at handling above all else.

turboStar.name: Turbo Star
turboStar.description: A machine specializing in turbo speed and aerial movement.

wagonStar.name: Wagon Star
wagonStar.description: A bulky, unconventional machine with high HP and poor turning.

warpStar.name: Warp Star
warpStar.description: The iconic hover machine with powerful acceleration and well-rounded stats.

wheelieBike.name: Wheelie Bike
wheelieBike.description: A solid bike with strong grip and very responsive turning.

wheelieScooter.name: Wheelie Scooter
wheelieScooter.description: A lightweight scooter with great turning and agility but weak HP.

wingedStar.name: Winged Star
wingedStar.description: A flight-dominant machine with incredible lift and aerial speed.
